values.content: You are an expert team building analyst with 20 years of experience in organizational psychology and team dynamics. Analyze the provided team building session data and generate comprehensive insights.

Please analyze this team building session data and provide detailed insights:

GAME METRICS:
- Participation Rate: {{$json.gameMetrics.participationRate}}%
- Average Response Time: {{$json.gameMetrics.responseTime}} seconds
- Engagement Score: {{$json.gameMetrics.engagement}}/10
- Collaboration Score: {{$json.gameMetrics.collaboration}}/10
- Team Size: {{$json.gameMetrics.playerCount}} people

MANAGER OBSERVATIONS:
- Team Dynamics: {{$json.managerObservations.teamDynamics}}
- Communication Issues: {{$json.managerObservations.communication}}
- Leadership Emergence: {{$json.managerObservations.leadership}}
- Creativity Level: {{$json.managerObservations.creativity}}
- Trust Indicators: {{$json.managerObservations.trust}}

PROVIDE:
1. Executive Summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Top 3 Team Strengths
3. Top 3 Areas for Improvement  
4. 5 Specific Action Recommendations
5. Follow-up Activity Suggestions
6. Risk Assessment (if any)

Format as JSON with clear sections.

parameters.functionCode:
// Generate PDF report content const reportData = items[0].json; // Simple HTML to PDF content const htmlContent = `

${reportData.pdfData.title}

Generated on ${reportData.pdfData.date}

Manager: ${reportData.managerName}

Executive Summary

${reportData.insights.executiveSummary}

${reportData.metrics.overallEngagement}%
Overall Engagement
${reportData.metrics.participationRate}%
Participation Rate
${reportData.metrics.teamCohesion}/10
Team Cohesion
${reportData.metrics.communicationScore}%
Communication

Team Strengths

    ${reportData.insights.strengths.map(strength => `
  • ${strength}
    • `).join('')}

Areas for Improvement

    ${reportData.insights.improvements.map(improvement => `
  • ${improvement}
    • `).join('')}

Recommended Actions

    ${reportData.insights.recommendations.map(rec => `
  1. ${rec}
    2. `).join('')}

Generated by Blyza AI Team Analytics Platform

Session ID: ${reportData.sessionId}

`; // For demo purposes, we'll create a mock PDF URL // In production, you'd use a proper HTML to PDF service const pdfUrl = `https://demo-reports.blyza.com/report-${reportData.sessionId}.pdf`; return [{ json: { ...reportData, pdfContent: htmlContent, pdfUrl: pdfUrl, pdfGenerated: true } }];

parameters.subject: Team Building Analysis Report - {{$json.gameInfo.gameName}}
parameters.message:
Hi {{$json.managerName}},

Your team building analysis report is ready! Here are the key highlights:

ü§ù Team Cohesion: {{$json.metrics.teamCohesion}}/10
üí¨ Communication Score: {{$json.metrics.communicationScore}}%

üéØ Top Recommendations:
{{$json.insights.recommendations.0}}
{{$json.insights.recommendations.1}}
{{$json.insights.recommendations.2}}

You can view the detailed interactive report in your dashboard: https://app.blyza.com/dashboard

The full PDF report is attached to this email.

Best regards,
The Blyza Team
